newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China United to place 150 mln warrants.
newsitem.headline: China United to place 150 mln warrants.

text.p: Gift packaging and property investment concern China United Holdings Ltd said on Friday it planned to privately place 150 million 1996-1998 warrants at HK$0.17 each.
Proceeds of HK$22.1 million from the warrants issue would be used to repay part of the company's bank borrowings, it said.
C.A. Pacific Securities Ltd is the placing agent.

Each warrant entitles holder the right to subscribe one company share at an initial subscription price of HK$0.385 per share, subject to adjustment, at any time between the date of issue and September 30, 1998, it said.
The exercise in full of all the warrants would result in the issue of 150 million new shares or 16.6 percent of the expanded share capital.
Shares of China United ended at HK$0.475 on Thursday.
